query:
SELECT 
  c.id as campaign_id,
  c.slug,
  c.name,
  au.id as admin_id,
  au.username,
  au.name as admin_name
FROM campaigns c
LEFT JOIN admin_users au ON au.campaignId = c.id
WHERE c.slug = 'teste-guilherme';
